UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The maculatin peptides from the skin glands of the tree frog Litoria genimaculata: a comparison of the structures and antibacterial activities of maculatin 1.1 and caerin 1.1.
Literature.Author: Rozek T, Waugh RJ, Steinborner ST, Bowie JH, Tyler MJ, Wallace JC

Literature.Title: Structure-activity relationship of an antibacterial peptide, maculatin 1.1, from the skin glands of the tree frog, Litoria genimaculata.
Literature.Author: Niidome T, Kobayashi K, Arakawa H, Hatakeyama T, Aoyagi H

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus cereus(MIC=>100µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=>100µg/ml),Listeria innocua(MIC=>100µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=>100µg/ml),Pasteurella multocida(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=>100µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=>100µg/ml),Streptococcus uberis(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus IFO 12732(MIC=>64µM),Bacillus subtilis IFO 3134(MIC=>64µM),Escherichia coli IFO 12734(MIC=>64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa IFO 12582(MIC=>64µM),Leuconostoc lactis(MIC=>100µg/ml)
